And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto me, <WG3427> These <WG3778> sayings <WG3056> are faithful <WG4103> and <WG2532> true: <WG228> and <WG2532> the Lord <WG2962> God <WG2316> of the <WG3588> holy <WG40> prophets <WG4396> sent <WG649> his <WG848> angel <WG32> to show <WG1166> unto his <WG848> servants <WG1401> the things which <WG3739> must <WG1163> shortly <WG1722> <WG5034> be done. <WG1096>
